title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 14 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 14 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Man that is born of a woman is of few days, and full of trouble.
lineList.cn: 人为妇人所生，日子短少，多有患难。

lineList.en: He cometh forth like a flower, and is cut down: he fleeth also as a shadow, and continueth not.
lineList.cn: 出来如花，又被割下。飞去如影，不能存留。

lineList.en: And dost thou open thine eyes upon such an one, and bringest me into judgment with thee?
lineList.cn: 这样的人你岂睁眼看他吗。又叫我来受审吗。

lineList.en: Who can bring a clean thing out of an unclean? not one.
lineList.cn: 谁能使洁净之物出于污秽之中呢。无论谁也不能。

lineList.en: Seeing his days are determined, the number of his months are with thee, thou hast appointed his bounds that he cannot pass;
lineList.cn: 人的日子既然限定，他的月数在你那里，你也派定他的界限，使他不能越过。

lineList.en: Turn from him, that he may rest, till he shall accomplish, as an hireling, his day.
lineList.cn: 便求你转眼不看他，使他得歇息。直等他像雇工人完毕他的日子。

lineList.en: For there is hope of a tree, if it be cut down, that it will sprout again, and that the tender branch thereof will not cease.
lineList.cn: 树若被砍下，还可指望发芽，嫩枝生长不息。

lineList.en: Though the root thereof wax old in the earth, and the stock thereof die in the ground;
lineList.cn: 其根虽然衰老在地里，干也死在土中。

lineList.en: Yet through the scent of water it will bud, and bring forth boughs like a plant.
lineList.cn: 及至得了水气，还要发芽，又长枝条，像新栽的树一样。

lineList.en: But man dieth, and wasteth away: yea, man giveth up the ghost, and where is he?
lineList.cn: 但人死亡而消灭。他气绝，竟在何处呢。

lineList.en: As the waters fail from the sea, and the flood decayeth and drieth up:
lineList.cn: 海中的水绝尽，江河消散乾涸。

lineList.en: So man lieth down, and riseth not: till the heavens be no more, they shall not awake, nor be raised out of their sleep.
lineList.cn: 人也是如此，躺下不再起来。等到天没有了，仍不得复醒，也不得从睡中唤醒。

lineList.en: O that thou wouldest hide me in the grave, that thou wouldest keep me secret, until thy wrath be past, that thou wouldest appoint me a set time, and remember me!
lineList.cn: 惟愿你把我藏在阴间，存于隐密处，等你的忿怒过去。愿你为我定了日期，记念我。

lineList.en: If a man die, shall he live again? all the days of my appointed time will I wait, till my change come.
lineList.cn: 人若死了岂能再活呢。我只要在我一切争战的日子，等我被释放（被释放或作改变）的时候来到。

lineList.en: Thou shalt call, and I will answer thee: thou wilt have a desire to the work of thine hands.
lineList.cn: 你呼叫，我便回答。你手所做的，你必羡慕。

lineList.en: For now thou numberest my steps: dost thou not watch over my sin?
lineList.cn: 但如今你数点我的脚步，岂不窥察我的罪过吗。

lineList.en: My transgression is sealed up in a bag, and thou sewest up mine iniquity.
lineList.cn: 我的过犯被你封在囊中，也缝严了我的罪孽。

lineList.en: And surely the mountain falling cometh to nought, and the rock is removed out of his place.
lineList.cn: 山崩变为无有。磐石挪开原处。

lineList.en: The waters wear the stones: thou washest away the things which grow out of the dust of the earth; and thou destroyest the hope of man.
lineList.cn: 水流消磨石头，所流溢的洗去地上的尘土。你也照样灭绝人的指望。

lineList.en: Thou prevailest for ever against him, and he passeth: thou changest his countenance, and sendest him away.
lineList.cn: 你攻击人常常得胜，使他去世。你改变他的容貌，叫他往而不回。

lineList.en: His sons come to honour, and he knoweth it not; and they are brought low, but he perceiveth it not of them.
lineList.cn: 他儿子得尊荣，他也不知道。降为卑，他也不觉得。

lineList.en: But his flesh upon him shall have pain, and his soul within him shall mourn.
lineList.cn: 但知身上疼痛，心中悲哀。
